title: Weather App
summary: Frontend Development: Built a responsive weather application using Next.js and TypeScript, ensuring a seamless and visually engaging user experience across devices.
API Integration: Utilised Axios to fetch real-time weather data from APIs, enabling accurate weather updates for user-specified locations.
State Management: Implemented Jotai for efficient and lightweight state management, streamlining data flow and enhancing application maintainability.
Geolocation and User Interaction: Integrated the browserâ€™s navigator.geolocation API to provide location-specific weather updates, enhancing user convenience and interactivity.
